thread.title: Why I’m dreaming of subsidence this Christmas
thread.title_full: Why I’m dreaming of subsidence this Christmas

author: Emma Ann Hughes
title: Why I’m dreaming of subsidence this Christmas
text:
Why I’m dreaming of subsidence this Christmas
Editor’s View: Rather than our days being merry and bright, this Christmas looks set to be wet and windy rather than white, causing Emma Ann Hughes to dream of subsidence rather than snowman building this December.
As I put up my Christmas decorations the other day, rather than look out at twinkling frost on the lawn, I shuddered as the wind and rain of Storm Darragh lashed the pitiful pebble dashed external
